data.name: Taiga
data.detailed_description:
A team of prospector scientists are exploring far reaches of Russian taiga in search of mineral deposits. But what made them think they could decide the fate of these lands?



You play as Sergey, you have just joined the prospector team, and they are already carrying out local geology inspection. Next morning you were supposed to join in on the action, but.. The taiga has other plans for you and these men. Will you live through the ordeal?



Stay close to sources of light, and avoid staying the dark for too long.
In this wilderness even the hardest people start to give away.
And that is when the taiga takes you.



Consult your GPS navigator often, it would be foolish to think that you can make it out of this green maze by memory or instinct.

Features:

  • VR mode! Play with maximum immersion. (Currently supported headsets: Oculus
  • Controller support in-game!

Note:

The game is complete, but small tweaks and fixes may still come down the line. As well as graphical improvements.

data.short_description: Taiga is an atmospheric first person horror game with elements of survival. Explore the maze like forest, Uncover dark secrets that lay beneath pine and spruce. Save your colleagues if you can, but most importantly. Escape with your life.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad Core or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950 or Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: i5 3GHz or Ryzen 5 3GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
